skills.name: Soul Summoning
skills.description: Summons the souls of the dead to attack the enemy 2 - 3 times. Each attack has a 40% chance to decrease the enemy's Attack Speed for 2 turns.

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.name: Deadly Touch
skills.description: Randomly attacks the enemies several times and weakens the Defense for 2 turns with a 35% chance with each attack and exchanges the decrease attack speed effect with the stun effect for 1 turn.

skill_effect.name: Stun

skills.name: Wall of the Dead (Passive)
skills.description: Creates a shield every turn to absorb incoming damage proportionate to your level. Decreases the attacker's Attack Speed for 1 turn if you're attacked when you have the shield. [Automatic Effect]

skill_effect.name: Auto Effect
skill_effect.description: The skill effect is automatically triggered.

skill_effect.name: Shield
skill_effect.description: A shield is created to absorb a portion of incoming damage
